name: Monsters Master: Catch & Fight
description:
Monsters Master is a multiplayer adventure game, where you can breed, collect, train and evolve monsters. Choose your monsters, create your combat strategy and get ready for monster battle! Build your fighting force and face other Monster Masters!

Travel and explore a new world filled with a lot of different pocked monsters! Look around the area, tame new pocket monsters, build your battle team and evolve them to become monsters legends!

FEATURES
● Duel players from around the world in real-time
● Different monster legends - collect powerful new monsters and grab them to the arena!
● Defeat ather monster catchers to win raitings and become a legend
● Collect and evolve different monsters, make them learn new moves and summon them to the arena!
● Create your ultimate battle monster team to defeat all the opponents

Discover the Monsters Master adventure game. Catch and collect all the battle monsters! Choose your monsters, create your combat strategy and get ready for monster battle!
